China's Pan sets 100 metres freestyle world recordChina's teen sensation Pan Zhanle set the men's 100 metres freestyle world record at the swimming World Championships in Doha on Sunday with a stunning leadoff swim in the 4x100m relay to power his nation to the title. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 18:30:50 GMT L26B2JB7Z5LS3C47WK5OTXWBUE https://www.reuters.com/sports/chinas-pan-sets-100-meters-freestyle-world-record-world-championships-2024-02-11/Ian Ransom运动的
Senate faces new test on Ukraine aid billA narrowly divided U.S. Senate moved closer to passing a $95.34 billion aid package for Ukraine, Israel and Taiwan on Sunday, showing undiminished bipartisanship despite mounting opposition from Republican hardliners and Donald Trump. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 11:03:14 GMT 45CRWY7UZVM5TAD4G2VIZWWMKE https://www.reuters.com/world/us/us-senate-faces-new-test-ukraine-aid-bill-2024-02-11/David Morgan世界美国
Exclusive: Xiaomi says India's scrutiny of Chinese firms unnerves suppliersChina's Xiaomi has told New Delhi that smartphone component suppliers are wary about setting up operations in India amid heavy scrutiny of Chinese companies by the government, according to a letter and a source with direct knowledge of the matter. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 10:53:59 GMT CCI55FZZOVKJBB非洛尔PCGAI https://www.reuters.com/technology/xiaomi-says-indias-scrutiny-chinese-firms-unnerves-suppliers-2024-02-11/Aditya Kalra, Munsif Vengattil技术
Philippines accuses China of dangerous manoeuvres near Scarborough ShoalThe Philippines' coast guard (PCG) on Sunday accused China of "dangerous and blocking" manoeuvres while its vessel patrolled near Scarborough Shoal in the South China Sea this month. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 07:33:56 GMT WJ3H7G4LRVOZHEQRZUFVDBHKQM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippines-accuses-china-dangerous-maneuvers-near-scarborough-shoal-2024-02-11/Reuters世界亚太地区
Taiwan reports more Chinese balloons over Taiwan StraitTaiwan's defence ministry said on Sunday it had detected eight Chinese balloons crossing the Taiwan Strait in the previous 24 hours, of which five flew across Taiwan, the second day in a row is has reported a large number of balloons. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 01:21:25 GMT E2BUIBOAHFIRJEXWWXKJQHZKCI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-reports-more-chinese-balloons-over-taiwan-strait-2024-02-11/Reuters世界亚太地区
Republican China committee chairman Gallagher retiring from US CongressU.S. Representative Mike Gallagher, who chairs the House select committee on competition with China, said on Saturday he will not run for re-election, four days after he was one of only four House Republicans to buck party leadership and vote against impeaching President Joe Biden's top border official. Sat, 10 Feb 2024 20:17:22 GMT YZIXCJHTZRMUHI4LUPHL4JWX3Q https://www.reuters.com/world/us/republican-china-committee-chairman-gallagher-retiring-us-congress-2024-02-10/Patricia Zengerle世界美国
Beijing cancels Argentina friendly as Messi fallout continuesArgentina's friendly against Ivory Coast, scheduled to be held in Beijing in March, has been cancelled, the Chinese city's football association said on Saturday, following a backlash against Lionel Messi's failure to play in a match in Hong Kong. Sat, 10 Feb 2024 14:35:26 GMT T2TJRJIFJ5PPNH4MSRV6E2MJHA https://www.reuters.com/sports/soccer/beijing-cancels-argentina-friend-messi-fallout-continues-2024-02-10/Reuters运动的足球
JSW Group to set up nearly $5 billion in EV projects in eastern IndiaIndia's JSW Group will set up electric vehicles and battery manufacturing projects in the country's eastern state of Odisha at a cost of 400 billion rupees ($4.82 billion). Sat, 10 Feb 2024 07:21:03 GMT EP5EJVZUNVPY5FDXX2JPFMMA44 https://www.reuters.com/world/india/jsw-group-set-up-nearly-5-bln-ev-projects-eastern-india-2024-02-10/Reuters世界印度
Taiwan reports Chinese balloons at start of New Year holidayTaiwan's defence ministry said on Saturday it had detected eight Chinese balloons crossing the Taiwan Strait in the previous 24 hours, two of which flew across the island, in an uptick of activity at the start of the Lunar New Year holiday. Ukraine aid bill inches forward in US SenateIf the legislation passes the Senate, it will face an uncertain future in the Republican-controlled House, where Speaker Mike Johnson has indicated he could split the aid into separate bills. Sat, 10 Feb 2024 01:02:26 GMT第333章https://www.reuters.com/world/us/ukraine-aid-bill-inches-forward-us-senate-2024-02-10/David Morgan世界美国
TikTok loses court fight to suspend EU gatekeeper statusByteDance's TikTok has lost its bid to suspend its designation as a gatekeeper, which makes it subject to onerous obligations under EU rules, after Europe's second top court dismissed its request because it failed to show the urgency for such a move. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 15:58:19 GMT JYIZ5JHXUFMGZI3U25BMNDWM2E https://www.reuters.com/technology/eu-court-dismisses-bytedances-appeal-against-gatekeeper-status-2024-02-09/Bart Meijer, Foo Yun Chee技术
